thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 3 of 147
thread.title: Jason Bustamante

author: Jason Bustamante
title: Jason Bustamante
text: They should rename their support dept. to the "Exceeding Expectations Team" They constantly go out of their way, to find ways, to upgrade us when we don't even ask for it. >>Ex. We had a shipping dilemma on our end and needed something for the beginning of the next week. They next day'ed the shipping and our stress was gone. >>And we're not even that big of an account for them. Absolute class people there. Highly Recommended.
